parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.70</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if given object can be stored in inventory of given object or any inventory container ([[uniform]], [[vest]], [[backpack]]) of given unit. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[canAdd]] item </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - unit or container </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]] - Config class </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> object [[canAdd]] [item, count] <template><title>since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55.133607</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - unit or container  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [item, count]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> item: [[String]] - Config class </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - desired quantity  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[player]] [[canAdd]] "FirstAidKit") [[then]] {
   [[player]] [[addItem]] "FirstAidKit";
} [[else]] {
   [[hint]] "Not enough space";
};
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (_box [[canAdd]] "FirstAidKit") [[then]] {
   _box [[addWeaponCargo]] ["FirstAidKit", 1];
} [[else]] {
   [[hint]] "Not enough space";
};
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>car [[canAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[currentWeapon]] [[player]], 50];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[canAddItemToUniform]], [[canAddItemToVest]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value> </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 29, 2015 - 00:02 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Jonpas|Jonpas]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Can also be used on any object that has inventory, not only player inventory containers.<br>
<br>
Where <b>_box</b> is <b>B_supplyCrate_F</b>:
<code>// Empty
_box canAdd "FirstAidKit";
-> true

// Full
_box canAdd "FirstAidKit";
-> false
</code>
</dd>
</dl>

<dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 11, 2017 - 18:40 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This can also be used as alternative to [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[canAddItemToUniform]], [[canAddItemToVest]] where container might not be strictly defined.In some cases it might be a good optimisation for your code, where you also don't need to perform checks on which type of player container this is. Example:<br>
<code>_i = [(uniformContainer player),(vestContainer player),(backpackContainer player)] call BIS_fnc_selectRandom;
if (_i canAdd "Rangefinder") then {
    _i addItemCargoGlobal ["Rangefinder",1];
};
</code>

</dd>
</dl>

<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
